content.p: Print RCWs > Title 82 > Chapter 82.08 > Section 82.08.090 82.08.080 << 82.08.090 >> 82.08.100 PDF RCW 82.08.090 Installment sales and leases. In the case of installment sales and leases of personal property, the department of revenue, by regulation, may provide for the collection of taxes upon the installments of the purchase price, or amount of rental, as of the time the same fall due. [ 1975 1st ex.s. c 278 s 49 ; 1961 c 15 s 82.08.090 . Prior: 1959 ex.s. c 3 s 8 ; 1959 c 197 s 4 ; prior: 1941 c 178 s 9, part; 1939 c 225 s 12, part; 1935 c 180 s 25, part; Rem. Supp. 1941 s 8370-25, part.] NOTES: Construction — Severability — 1975 1st ex.s. c 278: See notes following RCW 11.08.160 .
